fieldElement.label: Tort Option
fieldElement.fieldHelper: The Kentucky no-fault statute provides for any person who registers, operates, maintains, or uses a motor vehicle on the public roadways of Kentucky to, as a condition of such, be bound by the provisions of the no-fault law with a monetary tort threshold for bodily injury losses (unless such tort limitation is rejected).

fieldElement.label: Basic First Party Benefits Limit
fieldElement.fieldHelper: Additional First Party Benefits is an optional coverage. A policy may elect Additional First Party Benefits or Combination First Party Benefits but not both. There are 4 limits (Medical, Work Loss Monthly/Per Accident, Funeral Expense and Accidental Death Benefit)

fieldElement.label: Combination First Party Benefits
fieldElement.fieldHelper: Combination First Party Benefits is an optional coverage. A policy may elect Additional First Party Benefits or Combination First Party Benefits but not both. There are 3 limits (Combined Medical/Work Loss, Funeral Expense and Accidental Death Benefit) applicable to this coverage. If this coverage is desired, you must select a set of limits.

fieldElement.label: With the exception of encumbrances, are any vehicles not solely owned by and registered to the applicant?
Do over 50% of the employees use their autos in the business?
Is there a vehicle maintenance program in operation?
Are any vehicles leased to others?
Are any vehicles customized, altered or have special equipment?
Are ICC, PUC or other filings required?
Do operations involve transporting hazardous material?
Any vehicles used by family members?
Does the applicant obtain MVR verifications?
Does the applicant have a specific driver recruiting method?
Are any drivers not covered by Worker's Compensation?
Any vehicles owned but not scheduled on this application?
Any drivers with convictions for moving traffic violations?
Are all vehicles to be included in this policy part of a fleet?
Do you have electronic monitoring devices that record and transmit data in any of your vehicles?

pageElement.fieldElement: This section is intended to tie Loss Payees and Additional Insured Lessors to Vehicles. Any other entity tied to a particular vehicle can be entered here as well. To add new additional interests, please complete the "Additional Interests" section and click "Add" button. If you don't have any additional interests, please click "Continue" to proceed.
